definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Sales are poor this month. There may, however, be an increase before Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 这个月销量很差，但圣诞节前可能会增加。

sentences.english: The album itself sold over two-million copies and reached the Top 20.
sentences.chinese: 这张专辑本身的销量超过两百万份，并达到前20名。

sentences.english: The second quarter, the continuous high card.
sentences.chinese: 二季度，重卡产销量持续处于高位。

sentences.english: Then, Hush Puppies shoes sales began to increase ceaselessly.
sentences.chinese: 于是，暇步士运动鞋的销量开始不断增加。

sentences.english: Guess which state contributed to approximately 15% of these sales?
sentences.chinese: 猜一猜哪个州的销量占了几乎总销量的15%？

sentences.english: Guess which state contributed to approximately 15% of these sales?
sentences.chinese: 猜一猜哪个州的销量占了几乎总销量的15%？

sentences.english: All sorts of seamless steel tube production and the highest are over.
sentences.chinese: 各种无缝钢管产销量均创历年来的同期最高。

sentences.english: Motor traders are looking forward to a further increase in vehicle sales.
sentences.chinese: 廋汽车经销商预期汽车销量会进一步攀升。

sentences.english: Very few foreign sales this month, the price is only an empty peg.
sentences.chinese: 本月外销量极少，价格仅是空挂。

sentences.english: Snus sales and volumes grew in all Scandinavian markets.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的北欧市场中，鼻烟销售额和销量都增长。

sentences.english: But in the United States, auto sales fell 34 percent last month.
sentences.chinese: 然而在美国本土，上月汽车销量下降了34个百分点。

sentences.english: Our sales are going up year after year. And we still have a large potential production capacity.
sentences.chinese: 销量年年递增，我们的生产潜力还很大。

sentences.english: According to Cournot model, profit will rising with sales of welfare lottery.
sentences.chinese: 因此提高销量是福利彩票发展的根本途径。

sentences.english: Kobe also topped the list in the US and China.
sentences.chinese: 在美国和中国销售榜上，科比的球衣也是销量第一。

sentences.english: His solo albums sold millions of copies and won numerous awards in the UK and in the US.
sentences.chinese: 他的个人专辑销量百万，曾在英美两国获过多枚奖项。

definition: to sell strongly/to be in great demand
to cut the price/to drive down the price/to get cheaper
public praise/public reputation/commonly held opinions/current idiom
achievement/accomplishment/(in more recent usage) performance (of a business, employee etc)/results
